text:
<https://www.mavenagi.com/|Maven AGI> is hiring our first customer success manager  / technical account manager!

As a Customer Success Manager, you will play a pivotal role in enabling Maven customers to reimagine their customer experience, driving efficiency, reducing costs, and enhancing customer satisfaction.  Join <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sshalabi/|Sami Shalabi> <https://www.linkedin.com/in/jcorbin01/|Jonathan Corbin> and the full Maven team: <https://apply.workable.com/mavenagi/j/5A08108ECD/>
